original_text:
then your barns will be filled to overflowing,
    and your vats will brim over with new wine.
korean_text: 그리하면 네 창고가 가득히 차고 네 포도즙 틀에 새 포도즙이 넘치리라

sentences.original_text: then your barns will be filled to overflowing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 네 창고가 가득히 채워질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and your vats will brim over
